attributes.action: Stop the monopoly of large companies in government procurement. Allow small companies to save the UK money.
attributes.additional_details:
Government departments have procurement frameworks that allow a few large 'preferred' companies to monopolise the vast majority of government private sector work. Small companies have no chance to compete, even when they can offer vastly more cost effective services, and even when large companies fail time and time again.

We petition for a change to this madness, to allow fair and open competition.
